Episodes.Title: Pilot
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Ricky Gervais, Stephen Merchant
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: The premiere episode introduces the boss and staff of the Dunder-Mifflin Paper Company in Scranton, Pennsylvania in a documentary about the workplace.

Episodes.Title: Diversity Day
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, B.J. Novak, Mindy Kaling
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael's off color remark puts a sensitivity trainer in the office for a presentation, which prompts Michael to create his own.

Episodes.Title: Health Care
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Paul Lieberstein, Mindy Kaling
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael leaves Dwight in charge of picking the new healthcare plan for the staff, with disastrous results ahead.

Episodes.Title: The Alliance
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Michael Schur, Mindy Kaling
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Just for a laugh, Jim agrees to an alliance with Dwight regarding the downsizing rumors.

Episodes.Title: Basketball
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Mindy Kaling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael and his staff challenge the warehouse workers to a basketball game with a bet looming over both parties.

Episodes.Title: Hot Girl
Episodes.Writer: Greg Daniels, Mindy Kaling, Ricky Gervais
Episodes.Actors: Steve Carell, Rainn Wilson, John Krasinski
Episodes.Plot: Michael is just one of the many male staff who start vying for the attention of an attractive saleswoman in the office.
